news.title: Google Custom Audiences, the Combo of Custom Affinity and Custom Intent Audiences, Now Live
news.description: Custom audiences can now be utilized in Google Ads for Discovery, Display, YouTube, and Gmail campaigns, and can potentially target for reach, performance, or consideration.

news.title: Google Promises to Remove Search Suggestions That Might Seem Political -- Even If They’re True
news.description: Google is updating its autocomplete policies in an effort to remove election-related search suggestions that could be interpreted as favoring a given political candidate or party.

news.title: Local Businesses Can Highlight COVID-19 ‘Health & Safety’ Measures With Google My Business
news.description: New features are appearing on Google My Business listings that allow business owners to communicate health and safety attributes to consumers during the COVID-19 pandemic.

news.title: Google: Don’t Expect Same Rankings After Manual Action Recovery
news.description: Google’s John Mueller cautions that website owners should not expect their previous rankings to immediately return after a manual action penalty corrects a site’s artificial rankings.
